type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.Dependency
type.description: A Dependency represents a dependency on the artifacts from a particular source. A source can be an Ivy module, a Maven POM, another Gradle project, a collection of Files, etc... A source can have zero or more artifacts.

method.name: contentEquals
method.description:
Returns whether two dependencies have identical values for their properties. A dependency is an entity with a key. Therefore dependencies might be equal and yet have different properties.
param:dependency The dependency to compare this dependency with

method.name: copy
method.description:
Creates and returns a new dependency with the property values of this one.

returns:The copy. Never returns null.

method.name: getGroup
method.description: Returns the group of this dependency. The group is often required to find the artifacts of a dependency in a repository. For example, the group name corresponds to a directory name in a Maven like repository. Might return null.

method.name: getName
method.description: Returns the name of this dependency. The name is almost always required to find the artifacts of a dependency in a repository. Never returns null.

method.name: getVersion
method.description: Returns the version of this dependency. The version is often required to find the artifacts of a dependency in a repository. For example the version name corresponds to a directory name in a Maven like repository. Might return null.

property.name: group
property.description: Returns the group of this dependency. The group is often required to find the artifacts of a dependency in a repository. For example, the group name corresponds to a directory name in a Maven like repository. Might return null.

property.name: name
property.description: Returns the name of this dependency. The name is almost always required to find the artifacts of a dependency in a repository. Never returns null.

property.name: version
property.description: Returns the version of this dependency. The version is often required to find the artifacts of a dependency in a repository. For example the version name corresponds to a directory name in a Maven like repository. Might return null.
